release/

*.autosave

*.qbs.user

*.qrc.release
*.qrc.debug

# Compiler-specific
*.obj
*.o
*.a
*.lib
*.exp
*.pdb

# IDEs and Editor junk

*.swp
*~

# CMake artifacts
